trans-unit.source: Using the BizTalk Adapter Service (BAS)
trans-unit.target: Using the BizTalk Adapter Service (BAS)

trans-unit.source: Using <token>lobconnect</token>, your cloud application can communicate with Line-of-Business (LOB) systems on-premises, in your network, behind your firewall.
trans-unit.target: Using <token>lobconnect</token>, your cloud application can communicate with Line-of-Business (LOB) systems on-premises, in your network, behind your firewall.

trans-unit.source: Using the LOB adapters in the <token>bap</token> (BAP), a <token>lobconnect</token> application can execute LOB operations to the following on-premises LOB systems:
trans-unit.target: Using the LOB adapters in the <token>bap</token> (BAP), a <token>lobconnect</token> application can execute LOB operations to the following on-premises LOB systems:

trans-unit.source: Microsoft SQL Server
trans-unit.target: Microsoft SQL Server

trans-unit.source: Oracle Database
trans-unit.target: Oracle Database

trans-unit.source: Oracle E-Business Suite
trans-unit.target: Oracle E-Business Suite

trans-unit.source: SAP
trans-unit.target: SAP

trans-unit.source: Siebel eBusiness Applications
trans-unit.target: Siebel eBusiness Applications

trans-unit.source: Consider this scenario:
trans-unit.target: Consider this scenario:

trans-unit.source: There is an on-premises SQL Server that stores Customer data, including Name, Shipping Address, Order History, and Payment Methods.
trans-unit.target: There is an on-premises SQL Server that stores Customer data, including Name, Shipping Address, Order History, and Payment Methods.

trans-unit.source: You want to develop a purchasing application.
trans-unit.target: You want to develop a purchasing application.

trans-unit.source: When the order is being placed, this application retrieves the Name, Shipping Address, Order History, and Payment Methods from this SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: When the order is being placed, this application retrieves the Name, Shipping Address, Order History, and Payment Methods from this SQL Server database.

trans-unit.source: The goal is to host the application in the cloud and have it retrieve the customer data from this on-premises SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: The goal is to host the application in the cloud and have it retrieve the customer data from this on-premises SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: <token>lobconnect</token> is your answer.
trans-unit.target: <token>lobconnect</token> is your answer.

trans-unit.source: You continue to maintain your on-premises SQL Server and allow the cloud to host your application.
trans-unit.target: You continue to maintain your on-premises SQL Server and allow the cloud to host your application.

trans-unit.source: You can execute any LOB operation, like DELETE, INSERT, SELECT, UPDATE, from your cloud application.
trans-unit.target: You can execute any LOB operation, like DELETE, INSERT, SELECT, UPDATE, from your cloud application.

trans-unit.source: <token>lobconnect</token> provides the following benefits:
trans-unit.target: <token>lobconnect</token> provides the following benefits:

trans-unit.source: Cost effective: There are no individual relay endpoints in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: Cost effective: There are no individual relay endpoints in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: Supports a mix of systems: You can connect a cloud application to an on-premises LOB system with the <token>bap</token>.
trans-unit.target: Supports a mix of systems: You can connect a cloud application to an on-premises LOB system with the <token>bap</token>.

trans-unit.source: Maintenance: You continue to host your on-premises LOB system while the application is hosted in <token>azure_1</token>.
trans-unit.target: Maintenance: You continue to host your on-premises LOB system while the application is hosted in <token>azure_1</token>.

trans-unit.source: Flexibility: Execute a LOB operation in your table structure.
trans-unit.target: Flexibility: Execute a LOB operation in your table structure.

trans-unit.source: Development: Use Visual Studio to create your cloud applications, just like creating BizTalk Server applications.
trans-unit.target: Development: Use Visual Studio to create your cloud applications, just like creating BizTalk Server applications.

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell: Use cmdlets to manage your LOB components (including creating, updating, and deleting).
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell: Use cmdlets to manage your LOB components (including creating, updating, and deleting).
